name: Bakery
description: A shop filled with the aroma of fresh bread and pastries; adventurers can buy provisions, gather local gossip, or enjoy a moment of comfort.
atmosphere: The warm, inviting scent of freshly baked bread and sweet pastries fills the air, making mouths water. The sound of dough being kneaded and the crackle of the oven creates a comforting rhythm. Golden loaves and colorful pastries are displayed in the window, while the heat from the ovens creates a cozy, welcoming atmosphere.
